metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Azure Security Center - ACR Scan Results"},"name":"text - 0"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securitystatusessummaries"
| where name == "Microsoft_ContainerRegistry_registries"
| extend result=parsejson(properties.resourceHealthSummary)
| project Subscription=subscriptionId, Healthy=result.healthy, High=result.high, Medium=result.medium, Low=result.low, None=result.none","size":4,"title":"ACR Issue - Overview","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["value::all"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Subscription","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Healthy","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"is Empty","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"High","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"is Empty","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"error","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Medium","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"is Empty","representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"warning","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Low","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"is Empty","representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"1","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"None","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"is Empty","representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}]},"graphSettings":{"type":0},"mapSettings":{"locInfo":"LatLong"}},"name":"overview"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securitystatuses"
| where properties.type == "Microsoft_ContainerRegistry_registries"
| mv-expand properties.policyAssessments
| mv-expand properties_policyAssessments.assessmentKey
| project ACR=name, Resource_Group=resourceGroup, Assessment_Result=properties_policyAssessments.assessmentResult, Assessment_Key=properties_policyAssessments_assessmentKey","size":4,"title":"ACR Assessment Results","exportFieldName":"Assessment_Key","exportParameterName":"Assessment_Key","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["value::all"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"ACR","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Resource_Group","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Assessment_Result","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Low","representation":"info","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Assessment_Key","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"RG","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}}]},"sortBy":[]},"name":"assessment_results"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| where id has "{Assessment_Key}"
| project Severity=properties.metadata.severity,
    Implementation_Effort=properties.metadata.implementationEffort,
    User_Impact=properties.metadata.userImpact,
    Threats=strcat_array(properties.metadata.threats, ", "),
    Link=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal)","size":4,"title":"ACR - Assessment Details","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["value::all"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Severity","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Low","representation":"info","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Implementation_Effort","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Low","representation":"1","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Moderate","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"User_Impact","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Low","representation":"info","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Threats","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Link","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Implemenetation_Effort","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}}]}},"name":"assessment_details"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments/subassessments"
| where id has "{Assessment_Key}" and isnotnull (properties.id)
| mv-expand properties.additionalData.cve
| mv-expand properties.additionalData.vendorReferences
| project Time_Generated=properties.timeGenerated, Severity=properties.status.severity, ID=strcat_array(split(properties_additionalData_cve.link, "=", 1),""),
    Patchable=properties.additionalData.patchable, Issue=properties.displayName, Remediation=properties.remediation,
    Image=properties.additionalData.repositoryName, Digest=properties.additionalData.imageDigest,
    CVE=properties_additionalData_cve.link, Vendor=properties_additionalData_vendorReferences.link","size":4,"title":"ACR - Sub Assessment Details","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["value::all"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Time_Generated","formatter":6,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Severity","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Low","representation":"1","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"ID","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Patchable","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"disabled","text":""},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"true","representation":"Available","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"unknown","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"Issue","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Remediation","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Image","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Digest","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"CVE","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Vendor","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"ACR","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Link","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Resource","showIcon":true}}]}},"name":"subassessment_details"}],"isLocked":false,"styleSettings":{"progressStyle":"spinner"}}
